name: HKActivitySummary
desc: An object that contains the move, exercise, and stand data for a given day.

items.name: var activityMoveMode: HKActivityMoveMode
items.desc: The move mode used for this activity summary.

items.name: enum HKActivityMoveMode
items.desc: Constants that specify the value measured by the Move ring on the user’s device.

items.name: var activeEnergyBurned: HKQuantity
items.desc: The amount of active energy that the user has burned during the specified day.

items.name: var activeEnergyBurnedGoal: HKQuantity
items.desc: The user’s daily goal for active energy burned.

items.name: var appleMoveTime: HKQuantity
items.desc: The amount of time that the user has spent performing activities that involve full-body movements during the specified day.

items.name: var appleMoveTimeGoal: HKQuantity
items.desc: The user’s daily goal for move time.

items.name: var appleExerciseTime: HKQuantity
items.desc: The amount of time that the user has spent exercising during the specified day.

items.name: var appleStandHours: HKQuantity
items.desc: The number hours in the specified day during which the user has stood and moved for at least a minute per hour.

items.name: var appleStandHoursGoal: HKQuantity
items.desc: The user’s daily goal for stand hours.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueAppleStandHour
items.desc: Categories used to indicate whether the user stood during the sample’s duration.

items.name: func dateComponents(for: Calendar) -> DateComponents
items.desc: Date components that uniquely identify the day represented by the summary object.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathDateComponents: String
items.desc: The key path for accessing an activity summary’s date components.
